title: Spiced Apricot Loaf
ingredients: ['60g (2 oz) chopped dried apricots', '110ml (4 fl oz) pineapple juice', '170g (6 oz) wholemeal flour', '100g (3 oz) plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3 tablespoons dark brown muscavado sugar', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons rapeseed or vegetable oil', '180ml (6 fl oz) buttermilk']
